nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures.Texture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Texture2D, Texture3D

    public abstract class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    Texture object representation. Provides some generic methods and variables for all types of textures.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Texture(int gLMultiTexUnit)
      Generic constructor, should be called by all classes extending this class to set the glMultitexUnit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture

        public Texture(int gLMultiTexUnit)
        Generic constructor, should be called by all classes extending this class to set the glMultitexUnit.
        Parameters:
        gLMultiTexUnit - The OpenGL-internal MultitexUnit (GL.GL_TEXTUREX) this texture uses.

    • Method Detail

      • getGLMultiTexUnit

        public int getGLMultiTexUnit()
        Getter for glMultitexUnit.
        Returns:
        The OpenGL-internal GL_TEXTUREX this texture uses.

      • getMultitexNumber

        public int getMultitexNumber()
        Getter for the NUMBER associated with this Texture's GlMultitexUnit.
        Returns:
        this.glMultiTexUnit - GL.GL_TEXTURE0;

      • toMultitexNumber

        public static int toMultitexNumber(int val)
        Static method that provides a method of calculating the GLMultitexUnit represented by the given number.
        Parameters:
        val - The number of the GLMultitexUnit you wish to receive.
        Returns:
        val + GL.GL_TEXTURE0;
